summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Parks and Recreation Department and the City Light Department; authorizing transfer of partial jurisdiction over certain City (Parks and Recreation Department) property within Genesee Park and Playfield and Lake Washington Boulevard in the northeast quarter of Section 15, Township 24 North, Range 4 East, W.M., in King County, Washington, to the City Light Department for underground electrical distribution purposes. (P.M. \#240415-1-001B).
